about_the_game:
Slotfactory Create and Play - Standard Edition
For players and creators who want an entry level into slot game creation.
Limited to one internal save option.

Slotfactory is the ultimate destination for slot machine enthusiasts who want to create and play their own slot machine games. Slotfactory has something for everyone, whether you are a beginner or an expert, a casual player or a hardcore fan. Slotfactory has it all. So what are you waiting for? Play Slotfactory today and start creating and playing your own slot machine games.

Do you want to create and play your own slot machine games? If so, then you will love Slotfactory, the ultimate custom slot machine games platform that lets you unleash your creativity and imagination. Slotfactory is a game design and development company that offers a range of online, offline and mobile casino games. But what makes Slotfactory unique is that it also allows you to create and play your own slot machine games using its easy and intuitive tools.

Slotfactory has a library of many games that you can choose from, or you can start from scratch and design your own game. You can customize many aspect of your game, such as the theme, graphics, sounds, symbols. You can also test and tweak your game until you are satisfied with the result. Once you are done, you can share your graphics and sounds with other players.

Update Extras now includes 7 Themes in the install directory of slotfactory.
Theme Classic
Theme Egyptian
Theme Farmland
Theme Gangster
Theme Magic Brewery Extras
Theme Nautical
Theme Spooky

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10 32 bit
  • Processor: Intel - Amd
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Standard Video Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All Standard Sound Cards
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: For Amusement Only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel - Amd
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Standard Video Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All Standard Sound Cards
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: For Amusement Only

short_description: Slot Factory Bigger, Better, Brighter, and easier to create and play. Ever wanted to create a slot game but did know how to program. Here is the next best thing. Pokies4fun have Licensed the game engine to Slot Factory to create a slot making game for the gaming community now includes 7 Themes.
